aka: Notes of a Trip to Ibera
this_title: Apuntes de un viaje al Iberá
trans_title: Notes of a Trip to Ibera
introduction: In this documentary of fiction a Berlin young man, Rob, represents the European look toward a world seemingly strange. From their childhood Rob dream about a distant south american country he think that until it would be possible that should have origins indo-Argentineans. He believe to remember that their grandmother talked him about the "Iberá," a place in the north from Argentina, country for him, in the most southern place from Latin America, symbol of Indians, pampas and tango. He arrive and Buenos Aires disappoints it.., it is an European city. He depart immediately toward the Iberá, that mystic place on which so much legends. In some place between the islands they say that it are hidden the treasure of the Jesuits. Will it be true?
foreign_title: Apuntes de un viaje al Iberá
